

public class UnusualAdd {
	public int addAB(int a, int b) {
        // write code here
		 if(b==0)  
		        return a;  
		  int sum=a^b;  
		  int carry=(a&b)<<1;  
		 return addAB(sum,carry);  
    }
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a=4,b=3;
		UnusualAdd u=new UnusualAdd();
		System.out.println(u.addAB(a, b));
	}

}
